scripts.env: npm init && npm i express cors dotenv helmet morgan express-async-errors && npm i -D typescript ts-node @types/express @types/cors @types/helmet @types/dotenv @types/morgan
scripts.startv: npx tsc && node build/voos.js && node build/trechos.js && node build/aeroportos.js && node build/aeronaves.js && node build/cidades.js && node build/mapa.js && node build/passagem.js
